item.title: Nasdaq's listing plans will make it harder for small Chinese companies to go public in the U.S.
item.description: The move comes as tensions between the U.S. and China simmer, and as the Nasdaq faces broader financial market issues.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: American Eagle, Salesforce, C3.ai, Gitlab and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Stephen Miran, Trump's Fed governor nominee, pledges central bank independence
item.description: "Independence of monetary policy is a critical element for its success," Miran said in a prepared statement to the Senate Banking Committee.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Alphabet, Bruker, Sprinklr, Dollar Tree and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.title: Waller, in the running for chair, says Fed should start cutting this month and can adjust pace
item.description: "I think we need to start cutting rates at the next meeting," Waller said. "We don't have to go into a lock sequence of steps."
